review: another hidden object game

author: {'steamid': '76561198003970062', 'num_games_owned': 2038, 'num_reviews': 355, 'playtime_forever': 514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 514, 'last_played': 1505810546}
review:
Melissa K. and the Heart of Gold is a hidden object puzzle game. Like most such games, it is ultimately a point and click adventure game, with an inventory of items; what sets these games apart is that a lot of the puzzles in the game are so-called hidden object games, where you have to do exactly that – find objects hidden in the environment.

Ultimately, this takes two forms – firstly, as you are walking around, there are objects around the world, cunningly hidden in the scenery. These inventory objects are things you need to collect in order to progress in the game. As you can adjust your point of view somewhat, this is actually essential to finding a lot of the objects, and some of these objects require you to line up the scenery just so in order to collect them. While pretty traditional as far as adventure games go, the game does hide small objects around the screen a great deal more than most such games do.

The other form of hidden object game is where you are given a fixed-view screen and are supposed to click on particular items from a list given at the bottom of the screen, or click and drag objects across the screen in order to assemble some object or complete some task, usually according to somewhat obscured directions. Again, these challenges center around finding objects in the environment, but in a more fixed manner. Some of these puzzles combine the two, or have items hidden inside other items in the environment (behind spiderwebs, inside a chest or pot, ect.) and you must click on them or drag some other object (like a hammer) over to break them open and get the object inside.

These puzzles are somewhat akin to Where’s Waldo, albeit with much more mixed things you are trying to find. If you enjoy Where’s Waldo type stuff, these games are likely to be at least somewhat up your alley, though I have to admit the fact that sometimes you had to click on sealed objects was counterintuitive, as some of the closed objects are less than intuitive to click on, and there are sometimes objects that it looks like you could open, but which you cannot.

There are also ordinary puzzles in the game, of a fairly broad variety, though all are simple point, click, and drag things, with the odd puzzle requiring an inventory object to complete. Things from arranging boards in order to form a bridge to navigating screens with a lizard to collect every item on the screen, these generally work out okay, though none of them are exactly groundbreaking.

But as an adventure game, this is a game with an overarching story – and frankly, it is a bit crap. The story starts with Melissa K, who is totally not a female Indiana Jones, going to Thailand in order to tutor some monk about western archaeology. The monk, however, has gone missing, and your rather weird guide encourages you to go find him. So begins a five hour long adventure (eight if you complete the optional collector’s edition section, which you can play after you complete the main game) where you go around a fairly small but surprisingly dense number of 2.5D areas with a slightly adjustable point of view.

The story is pretty nonsensical – characters appear without much cause or warning, the dialogue is often bizarre and not very well-written, and the challenges you must complete often feel quite arbitrary. The game contains CG cutscenes and CG characters, and while the CG cutscenes are passable, the 3D characters look very, very weird. To some extent, this is apparently intentional, but it still ends up looking very uncanny valley. On the other hand, the 2D art is generally fairly decent, and your namable lizard sidekick is downright cute.

If you find hunt the pixel puzzles annoying, you will absolutely hate this game, because it is centered around such things. If, on the other hand, you like hidden object puzzles, this game is okay… but the story is not exactly amazing, as far as such things go. I can’t really recommend it for $10, its asking price, but I got it for $1, as part of a bundle of 50 games in fact, so I’m not sure I can really complain. Still, I think there are a lot better adventure games out there, so unless you really love hidden object puzzles, I’d give this a pass.

review:
The sequel to "Dick R and the arse of fire" which placed you in a Indian curry house with the only way out was to eat only the hottest curry dishes while working out the puzzles before your bowels exploded. This is a bit of a let down from that original game and is just more of a puzzle hidden object game which does not live up to the original.

Also Dick R had a lot more charisma and was certainly better looking than the new protagonist in this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198366212623', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 419, 'last_played': 1502178916}
review:
总体来讲我还是很喜欢这款游戏的，里面小游戏种类非常多，就是全程靠提示过这点有点麻烦。要说为什么是因为要找里面的东西还是比较麻烦的，鼠标移动上去没有提示，也没有弹丸论破一样的观察眼。然后这款游戏后期会提到幽灵所以对我来讲有点小恐怖，包括画面的变换也透露着一丝丝恐怖因素，不过接受度还好啦！
总体来讲非常良心啊，而且应该也是3d制作的，模型啊场景啊精细度非常之高！

author: {'steamid': '76561198210814135', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1500294101}
review:
一般的这类型的解谜游戏都是2D的，但这款应该是叫做《梅丽莎和黄金之心》的解谜游戏却是3D的（至少算是吧）。需要用鼠标拖拽场景让其转动来观察到其他地方，不过转动的范围极其有限，所以3D的效果并不明显，偶尔几个场景切换时会有个拉近走动的效果，只有那时候是最有3D感觉的……
游戏整体画面感觉不错，有好几个不短的过场动画，感觉过场动画做的很用心。BGM感觉还不错。
完成一些谜题的时候会显示你的正确率及所用时间，并会把游戏其他玩家的最高纪录同时显示出来。小游戏种类挺丰富，难度感觉中上，有几个小游戏卡了我很久——要么就是我智商太低了。
有些道具需要仔细查看，可以360度的自由转动并互动。这些道具的3D建模很精细，给人的感觉很好。
游戏本体加附加章节大约5小时左右。游戏内有笔记本，会把你游戏进行的几乎每一步都记录下来，甚至过场动画也会记录下来。现在这个快餐时代，还能看到这么仔细的笔记本，挺感动的——虽然这是14年的游戏。
翻译的话，整体翻译的都很好，只有极个别地方出现了疑似机翻的情况。
所以这本应是个非常不错的游戏——但我玩的并不是很愉快。如果我没记错的话，这个游戏是没有任何新手教学的。当然新手教学不是问题，这个游戏最要命的地方，就是他身为一个解谜游戏，而且是一个可以转动视角的解谜游戏，场景内可互动的地方鼠标移过不会有任何显示。就是，一般解谜游戏一个场景也就一个屏幕那么大，但他可以转视角，一个场景就不止一个屏幕那么大了，那么大个场景，完全不告诉你哪里是可以互动的。只能凭直觉去点，要么就瞎JB乱点，要么就用提示。要是直接看起来就很突兀的东西还好，但很多地方是完全看不出来藏着东西的。而且场景很大，但有时候互动区域就非常小一块，瞎JB乱点都未必能点到那。很多次我用提示看到提示结果之后，想到的都不是“噢，原来如此”，而是“草，这谁TM想得到啊”。地图的切换位置也是，把这个场景拖拽到最边，然后点那个最边边角就能到另一个场景——谁能想得到？不过好在游戏里有个按钮，点一下就会把当前场景所有能切换场景的位置都显示出来。游戏有地图，点地图可以快速传送，但并不是每一个场景都在地图上显示，是隔几个场景显示一个。
然后，要在这么要命的情况下找东西。找东西就找东西，关键把几个场景好不容易搜刮干净之后，来了段剧情，剧情过后，就会有一些新物品出现在你之前已经搜刮干净的场景中。玩到中后期场景多了之后，你完全不知道新增了几个物品，增在了哪个场景里，一个一个场景的回去找，然后还未必找得到。这个时候就只能狂点提示了。不过还好游戏里的提示非常好使，游戏也鼓励你用提示，50次提示还有个成就。有时候地图上会在某个场景上显示一个小绿勾，但是没有图示，并不知道这个小绿勾是什么意思，好像也不是整个场景都互动完毕的意思。要是能每个场景都显示在地图上，然后显示该场景目前是否互动完毕，那该有多好。
然后就是寻物谜题，寻物谜题有时候会有需要互动后才能找到的特殊物品，其实这个其他解谜游戏也有，但是人家鼠标移上去就会告诉哪互动啊。比如某个物品需要打开一个小盒子或撩开布找到，但根本不告诉你哪个小盒子是可以打开的哪个布是可以撩开的。你点了这个小盒子没反应，原来物品在另一个小盒子里，但你这下就算误点了，会算入最后的正确率里。然后再举个例子，附加关卡里的那个外套，是特殊物品，但我看到了一个非常相似的外套就扔在那里。点了没反应，我就想是不是不是这个，就四处点四处翻，也没有能打开或是能掀开的东西。最后一看答案，原来是外套上少了几个装饰物，要把装饰物安上去。那些装饰物虽然很细小我先前注意到过，因为好几个长的一样的，我就点了几下也没反应，就没再往那块想。这个游戏用物品互动的话不是点一下物品然后物品就跟着鼠标走了，你再点一下互动位置就行了，而是你要把物品一直点住鼠标拖到互动位置去才行。所以我点的那几下当然没反应，我得把它拖过去才行，所以要找可互动的物品就会更难。不过好在游戏内置一本很详细的图文攻略，就连寻物谜题的答案里面也都有。不然我真的要砸电脑了。

总的来说，这是个挺不错的游戏，就是玩起来有点要命。不过还是值得一玩的，实在不行就多用提示和内置的图文攻略吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198008914127', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1503937623}
review:
I really wanted to like this game for a number of reasons (contains spoilers):

1. It has a female archaeologist and she gets to explore Thailand!
2. References to Thai culture are absolutely fascinating
3. It's feels like a huge game - over 4 hours play time, and that's unusual for these point-and-click/hidden object games
4. It has all the right ingredients - interesting locations, hidden objects, mini-games, puzzles, variety of special objects
5. There's a real variety of puzzles
6. The music is lovely in places and the game has all the feel of something that took real time to make
7. There's a baby elephant! (definitely need more elephants in games - developers take note)


But, desite all this, it just doesn't work!

The reasons are (includes some spoilers):

1. The acting and characterisation is rubbish! The dialogue is so poor in places that I physically cringed. The Thai monk characterisation is borderline racist.

2. Finding some of the locations is really tricky - the rendering of the environments gives you little clue that there is anything else to investigate.

3. Some of the 'puzzles' are nonsensical. Why, oh, why do I use a 'catalyser', some sawdust and another chemical to fix a clearly broken boat? A boat which, I should add, was moments ago in a raging inferno which I had to douse with a fire extinguisher, and yet is miraculously unharmed! Oh, and at one point I have to dress a monkey so he'll give me an elaborate bracelet which makes me strong enough to break the bars of my prison!

4. The tone of the story and characters is all over the place. Melissa flirts with the other male archaeologist - is he meant to have been my mentor? Surely there's a real ethical dilemma about that one? What about having to retrieve the pickled remains of conjoined twins from a Mengele-like experiment, to satisfy an unhappy ghost? And yet, my character also asks whether her fellow archaeologist (he's so boring, I forget his name) has a "male" attitude to driving, and I'm meant to find it funny.

I really don't quite know how so much could be included in a game, so many hours could have been taken, and yet the result is so poor. There might be some fans out there, and sure it will take up a good few hours to complete, but I wouldn't say that there was anything I really liked in this one. Apart, maybe, from having a gecko sidekick - oh, and elephants!

author: {'steamid': '76561198371361547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1499131071}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198330217850', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1498314101}
review:
I wouldn't pay full price, but on discount it's a catch.

Pros:
- Long game and differentiated scenes, not artificially long.
- "Modern" gameplay for a HOPA, with scrolling scenes and some thinking out of the box.
- It actually has a decent story, even if it doesn't hold up to much scrutiny.

Cons:
- The voice acting is atrocious.The lines and interactions are not much better.
- I don't like games with achievements for failed tasks (make mistake X ten times in a row).
- I don't how else to say this, it's kind of a ridiculous game.
- A few times the controls get glitchy.
- A mini bug keeps unlocking my toolbar.

You'll have a very relaxing afternoon, if you don't take it too seriously.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114286156', 'num_games_owned': 1364, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 397, 'last_played': 1495248418}
review:
결말까지 겨우 억지로 봤습니다.화면이나 전개는 나름 괜찮은데 스토리 해결과정중 풀어나가는 실마리들이 연관성 없는게 너무 많습니다.
제작자들도 그걸 알았는지 힌트를 사용할 수 있게 만들어져 있습니다.
힌트 사용안하면 거의 풀수 없는 얼척없는 연관성들이지만 퍼즐들이나 숨은그림 찾기들은  나름 괜찮았습니다.
스토리는 빈약합니다. 점수가 중간도 있으면 중간줄텐데 예, 아니요 밖에 없어서 애매하네요.
추천을 선택하지만 중간짜리 추천입니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106448921', 'num_games_owned': 255, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 1059, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 803, 'last_played': 1494607058}
review:
已通关，总体来说还是不错的游戏。剧情比较长，小游戏也比较有挑战性

与Artifex 系列的找物不同，这个游戏采用了动捕技术。没错，一个手机游戏也采用了动作捕捉！在游戏通关后，主界面的视频里会多出一个制作花絮视频，里面有游戏的制作过程、人物的设计方案等等，看看比较有意思，会发现原来游戏是这么做出来的。此外游戏是3D的地图（不过视角的转动角度有限），很多东西需要旋转视角才能发现。

游戏取景泰国，宗教背景取自佛教。这与其他动不动就西方或者魔幻的寻物游戏有很大不同，显得非常有特色。由于历史原因，在游戏中也可以发现很多中国元素，比如12生肖。神猴哈罗曼其实就是《西游记》中孙悟空的宗教原型。还有卧佛、佛塔、寺庙、和尚……这些东方元素在中国玩家看来或许会比西方元素更具有亲和力。

不过另一方面，这游戏也有一些不太友好的地方。比如一些秘密信件必须在游戏过程中拾取，而且一不小心就可能漏掉。漏掉的话想要收集就必须重新开始游戏，而这个游戏并没有二周目的意义（因为收藏家模式本来就类似一个二周目），不收集这些物品就无法达成一些steam成就。在动画中，虽然采用了动捕技术，但是人说话时的嘴型总是特别奇怪。

推荐打折的时候购买。这个攻略很全，只不过是英文的：
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=416357336

[table]
    [tr]
        [td]优点[/td]
        [td]1. 画面较为精美
2. 价格合适
3. 剧情长
4. 可集卡
5. 亚洲元素丰富
6. 小游戏有挑战性[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]缺点[/td]
        [td]1. 达成全成就较难
2. 小游戏较难[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

author: {'steamid': '76561198130437252', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1492934055}
review:
Я люблю такие лёгкие и ни к чему не обязывающие игры-квестики. Но на эту игру цена завышена минимум в 3(!) раза. Да это золотое издание, с дополнительной кампанией за профессора-студента, продолжительность минут сорок, но это не 7$ (без скидки). Можно взять 3 игры за те же деньги, если повезёт и четыре.
Игра неплохая, но денег своих не стоит. Оценка моя 6 из 10. Однако НЕРЕКОМЕНДУЮ брать эту игру из-за стоимости. Только если она будет на скидке, или Вы огромный фанат таких игр, и Мелиссы К. в частности!

author: {'steamid': '76561198044005543', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 662, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1492189037}
review: 這是一款讓人很詫異的作品。從許多方面來看，它擁有令人讚賞的表現 (如美術風格、影像技術)，但單從遊戲性這一點來看，它卻像是個半成品！我個人很難接受〝不給提示〞是解謎遊戲的一種呈現方式，這與密室類型的性質是兩回事。我有玩到結局，但卻是一路靠著右下角的〝幫助〞功能，提示我下一步要做什麼而完成的。我個人不愛這樣的遊戲方式。

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1491983394}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
"Я ищу" с элементами головоломки. Сюжет рассказывает об обычной учительнице, которая зачем-то отправилась в Таиланд искать приключения на свою голову. Мы приезжаем в дом, а затем зачем-то начинаем искать маленького лысого мальчика, который потерялся и вообще нафиг нам не сдался, а так и понеслось...

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
¥ Необычное управление в локации, где мышью можно перемещать радиус обзора.
¥ Множество различных интересных головоломок.
¥ Красивая анимация и видео заставки.
¥ Коллекционное издание, включающее дополнительную главу после прохождения.

[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
¥ Азиатская мифология и фантастика тесно переплетаются между собой, в слабо выраженном, высосанном из пальца сюжете.
¥ Плохой русский перевод (можно было и не делать, раз не умеете).
¥ Трудные для получения достижения (пропустили одну статуэтку - начинайте сначала, кликнули пару раз не туда - начинайте сначала и таких вариантов много. Хотите получить все ачивки - играйте строго по руководству, да и там можно случайно оплошать и что-то пропустить) (читал на форуме, что некоторые ачивки не работают, но я играл в автономном режиме и мне вообще ни одной не засчиталось).

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Проходил в автономном режиме и честно признаюсь, что являюсь любителем жанра "Я ищу" и проходил точно более сотни подобных проектов. Этот же является одним из самых красивых, из того, что я видел, но одновременно и самым отталкивающим, как сюжетной частью, так и в целом геймплеем. Не рекомендую.

[h1]Оценка: 4/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

author: {'steamid': '76561198344054990', 'num_games_owned': 1975, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1491250344}
review: 该款游戏主要以泰国为游戏的背景，游戏讲述了在1947年的时候，在这个充满古老佛教的泰国，有很多不可思议的传说，而在某天Melissa收到来自英国女皇的邀请函时，当她踏上这段旅程的时候并不知道自己会有一段巨大的改变。那么在游戏中究竟发生了什么样的事呢？在游戏中玩家必须要根据游戏来进行解谜，寻找到隐藏的物品一步一步揭开谜底，寻找最终的答案。

author: {'steamid': '76561197971047607', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1491697499}
review:
Achievements seemed to be working for me, but I don't have enough interest in achievements to be so petty as to give a game a negative review because a couple of them are broken.

Melissa K. and the Heart of Gold CE is a breath of fresh air in the crowded HOG genre boasting high production values.

The good.
Cut scenes and artwork are excellent
The game is voice acted throughout and the quality is very good for a HOG.
The music is understated and fits the theme, and the sound effects are perfect.
The game's setting is in Thailand which is fresh and unlike every other generic HOG I've played.
The game plays out almost like an Indiana Jones movie even down to the time-period and there is an easter egg in the final cutscene to show where the game got it's inspiration from.
There is a lot more immersion in every scene than similar game, with the ability to expand the scene beyond your FOV to the top, bottom and sides of the screen, showing you objects you might not have spotted without looking around, you can even find objects that are behind obstacles by changing the point of view.
The puzzles range from easy to tricky, and the HO scenes also require you to interact with objects to create/find other objects.
There's fast travel via map.

The bad.
The game was ported to pc and shows this by the amount of clicking and dragging you need to do. It's not a big negative, but it's there.
The setting and theme are original, but the storyline is the still the boring and completely unoriginal "find the missing person and deal with supernatural elements" that all HOG developers are obsessed with.
Direction was lacking from time to time and but the hint button was handy when it occurred.

Overall, I think this is a game worth checking out if you are into HOGs. The Storyline was the weakest part of the game, but it wasn't enough to stop me from completing it. There is a lot of originality and the interaction was fresh. (but avoid if you are into achievements and are willing to neg-rep a game because one of them might not be working for you)

author: {'steamid': '76561198134404072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1491276253}
review:
如果你看到本遊戲整體褒貶不一的評價

我可以告訴最大原因是因為其實探索的部分，很多地方都沒有連貫性，導致你不案右下角的幫助提示，根本很難去探索
這個原因扼殺了本遊戲，很大一部分樂趣

接下來遊戲不錯的地方是能體驗很多不錯的解謎小遊戲，蠻好玩的
至於劇情我只能說普普，我覺得沒有特別精彩

如果你是剛好看到特價，又有時間玩的話，就可以購入玩玩  (建議特價有折扣再買)

author: {'steamid': '76561198008037159', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 252, 'last_played': 1491020580}
review:
플레이시간은 길지만 가면갈수록 스킵이 늘어나고 힌트를 많이쓰게되는 전개..
힌트를보면 좀 어이없어지는 위치에 힌트가 있음

author: {'steamid': '76561197979483526', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2795, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2795, 'last_played': 1489688703}
review:
I've played many hidden object games and can say with confidence that this is the worst I've played.  To say this story line doesn't make sense is an understatement.  There is no reason or logic to chain events together meaning you'll be looking for a random object to click on in within the various areas or using the hint button like it's your job. 

In no way have the developers created something worth playing here and may God have mercy on their souls.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029254070', 'num_games_owned': 1209, 'num_reviews': 333, 'playtime_forever': 1011, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1011, 'last_played': 1488897053}
review:
To druga gra tego typu którą przeszedłem do końca, no prawie do końca. Nie przepadam za point&click / ukryte przedmioty, tym razem było zupełnie inaczej. Gra ma solidną historię, wygląda bardzo ładnie, są ciekawe zagadki, dobrze zrobione ukryte przedmioty. Pomimo kilku minusów w tym karygodnego* grę oceniam bardzo pozytywnie.
Minusy:
- Kiepsko wyglądający ekwipunek, małe itemki więc czasem nie wiadomo po co to i dlaczego, często zbieramy coś co nie ma (jeszcze) logicznego sensu.
- Choć muzyka jest ok, to brak zdecydowanie choć jednego wpadającego w ucho kawałka.
- Postacie mogłyby być bardziej wyeksponowane, włącznie z nasza bohaterką, dałoby to zdecydowanie lepsze wsparcie tej przygodzie.
- *po ukończeniu podstawki (nie wiem co trudnego w ostatniej misji... no chyba że gra sie bez myszki, swoją drogą ta mini gra jest super) w 2/3 dodatkowego rozdziału złapałem buga, gra okazała sie niemożliwa do ukończenia. Szkiełko gotowe, nie dało się go wyjąć narzędziem, wskazówka w parym dolnym rogu się zacięła i nic nie chciała pokazywać, po restarcie gry wskazywała by zamknąć to okno po czym po aktywowaniu się na niebieskio - przestała działać w już ogóle. Przypuszczam gra uznała, że mam już szkiełko, smutny game over, bardzo smutny.

Plusów można tej grze dać na prawdę dużo, ale największym z nim dla mnie okazał się być jeden. Grę można przejść grając bez chwili wytchnienia, pod koniec już zacząłem sam sobie nastawiac dzwonek w telefonie, żeby jednak oczy te 5 minut odpoczęły. :) POMIMO dużego niesmaku praktycznie pod sam koniec gry - polecam tę przygodę.

review: 我个人觉得是这类游戏里挺糟糕的一个，故事包含及其浓重的宗教元素，但整个过程逻辑性存在一些问题，难以在不用帮助的情况下完成游戏。个人觉得这类游戏没那么必要使用3D，或者说这个作品的画面和3D应用有比较大的提升空间。类似搜索物品的一些小游戏不应该很小，缺少趣味性，即使最后通过提示发现了也觉得毫无道理，这个感觉导致失望。总而言之这实在不是一个好的作品，但如果打折或者免费，可以尝试，权当打发时间

author: {'steamid': '76561198046065881', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1487126837}
review:
Does this Indiana Jones' themed, yet-[i]another[/i]-female-protagonist, P&C/HOG game's storyline always make sense? Nope. Is the storyline so corny it will make your eyes roll? Uh huh. Do the voice actors unnaturally manipulate the pace of their speech to fit the CGI characters' sometimes bizarre lip movement to the point that it's painful to watch? Count on it. Is the gameplay in many places non-intuitive? Yep. Does the game commit the absolute most heinous HOG mortal sin of all - failing to provide cursor change on mouseover of active areas/items? It sure does!

...but does it deserve a thumbs down? IMHO, no.

This game is often annoying and dumb (to the point it - seemingly unintentionally - made me LOL a few times). But there's still more than enough of a game here for me to give it a recommend. I think you'll find this especially true if you play a lot of these types of games, generally enjoy casual P&C/HOG's, and get this one on sale. The graphics are good (I liked being able to drag the scene to look around) and there's plenty to do. In the end, I found more to like about it than not.

Also, the game played well for me on Linux Mint 18 (Wine/PlayOnLinux).

PS I almost exclusively play offline. I typically only play online long enough for Steam to allow me to write a review. So Steam only shows that I played 0.1 hrs as of the time of this review, although I've played at least 7 hrs and have completed both games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076290051', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1486909530}
review:
Я даже не знаю...
Обычная игра в жанре Point&Click.
Из плюсов: 
+ Вроде неплохой сюжет. Пойдет.
+ Музыкальное сопровождение - допустим,не отвратительное.
+ Достаточно долгое время игры (если играть на сложном).

Ну и... Все.
Минусы:
- Долгое время игры.Да-да,однообразие и тупости иногда зашкаливают.
- Постоянная беготня из локации в локацию. Если вы все нашли в комнате,не обольщайтесь,в ней через 20 минут игрового времени что то появится и не один раз.
- Отвратительные кат-сцены. Короткие,да настолько,что отлично подобранная музыка не успевает прозвучать и 5 секунд.
- Для русскоязычных - это кривоватый,но все таки перевод игры. Местами - ну просто *****.

Я заставил себя её пройти. Моя оценка: 6/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198160878337', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 988, 'last_played': 1486330196}
review: Melissa K. and the Heart of Gold Collector's Edition ist ein durchwachsenes Spiel. Das Spiel hat ein guten Sound, Grafik ist okey für ein Gelegenheitsspiel, die Athmosphäre ist eher düster gehalten und die Story ist irgendwie merkwürdig, aber für ein ''Wimmelbildspiel'' ganz okey. Leider hat dieses Spiel zu wenig Wimmelbilder, weswegen ich eigentlich dieses Spiel geholt habe. Man kann dieses Spiel eher als Puzzlegame bezeichnen, denn davon gab es reichlich. Manche Rätsel fand ich gut gemacht, andere wiederrum eher schlecht. Ich habe keine Ahnung wie man den Rekord auf schwer im Endspiel ''das Finale Tor'' schlagen soll. Cool fand ich die Gegenstände die man benutzen musste um etwas zu finden. Zum Beispiel finde ich den Gecko ganz süß, den man einen Namen geben kann oder die Taschenlampe. Ab Mitte des Spiels ist leider alles sehr verstrikt und du bekommst so gut wie gar keine Hinweise vom Spiel was du machen sollst, sodass man häufiger den Hilfe-Button drücken muss. Ist definitiv kein muss dieses Spiel, aber für zwischendurch doch ganz okey. Übrigens empfehle ich das Spiel zu kaufen, wenn das Spiel im Sale ist. Im Sale kostet es nur 0,89 Cent, während es ohne Sale 8,99 Euro zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt des Reviews kostet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198235746504', 'num_games_owned': 1224, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1485344406}
review:
It`s beautifully made and unlike other HOG games this one lets you choose resolution and quality of the game. It`s the little things.

Story does feel a bit bland, empty somehow, but I wouldn`t say I`m disappointed. 
Puzzles are hard and in the hidden object scenes you are truly on your own - so quit a challenge. I played on Advanturer (medium) difficulty, so it could be easier on Novice and even harder on Expert.

It allows you to replay all scenamatic movies, all puzzles and hidden object scenes so you can get achievements you might have missed.

It does have trading cards and achievements. Personally I love if the game has achievements - it gives even more fun to the game.
Overall I do suggest the game, it`s not the best HOG game I`ve played, but in the see of all the bad ones this is great.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137502098', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 319, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1484133057}
review: Po zakończeniu gry az musiałam wykrzyknąć "No nareszczie!" :D Gra mimo kilku poważnych problemów (zwłaszcza zbyt "epickiego" zakończenia) bardzo mi się spodobała. Wadami sa na pewno: wkurzająca muzyka, przedziwne animacje postaci i troszkę naciagana historia. W dodatku część zagadek nie wyjaśniała co tak naprawde mamy zrobić. Plusami są różnorodne lokacje, ciekawe zagdaki (część z nich była napradę trudna i czasochłonna) oraz nasz mały towarzysz któremu sami możemy nadac imię. No i to, że przeszukując lokacje możemy sie rozglądać na obki! Jest to pierwsza gra tego typu która ma to rozwiązanie. Ogólnie bardzo miło spędziłam przy tej grze ładnych parę godzin. Polecam!

author: {'steamid': '76561198075875415', 'num_games_owned': 366, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 579, 'last_played': 1483629676}

author: {'steamid': '76561198117054702', 'num_games_owned': 680, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 495, 'last_played': 1483716258}
review:
Habituellement je ne suis pas très fan des jeux d'objets cachés ; je leur préfère les vrais point'n'clik à la Lucas Art, Revolution, Pendulo... Ceci dit, j'ai trouvé Melissa K plutôt sympa.

Les graphismes paraissent certes un peu daté pour un jeu de 2014... mais faut voir le budget et le prix à sa sortie pour crier au scandale.

Ce que je reproche surtout à Melissa K, c'est son gameplay. Bien que les listes d'objets à trouver sont globalement moins tirées par les cheveux que d'autres jeux du genre, le gameplay rend la recherche assez frustrante. Il faut soit cliquer à l'aveugle soit utiliser un indice... Comment savoir que telle boite s'ouvre mais l'autre non ? Comment savoir qu'il faut faire glisser tel objet (alors que les autres ne bougent pas) pour trouver le bon objet en desssous ? Un changement de curseur, comme dans les point'n'click, aurait été apprécié...

La durée de vie laisse sans doute à désirer si vous êtes un habitué du genre. Si comme moi, vous n'êtes pas très rapide, ça reste raisonnable en comptant "l'épisode bonus". (A noter que je l'ai acheté en solde, je suis donc peut être plus clément que je ne l'aurai été au prix fort.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198353186959', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1133, 'last_played': 1483690707}
review:
ストーリーも、おもしろかったですし、ムービー中の顔がおもしろい
仏像が最後の１個が見つからなかったのが残念でしたマウスをグリグリ動かして景色の全体が見れるようになっていて巧妙に隠されたアイテムを探し出すのが楽しかったですコレクターズエディションのおかげで、ハッピーエンドになって本当にうれしかったです

author: {'steamid': '76561198324925228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1587224486}
review:
There is a lot to like about this game; the navigation system is inventive, the HOG are different and the story is interesting.
Unfortunately there is also a lot to dislike.
There is no way of knowing what you are supposed to do at points, sometimes it really does feel random, and without the hints you would be lost. I played on the easiest setting and still struggled with what I was supposed to be doing half the time.
I do love the Gecko though

Update; Just replayed it and it is anger inducing! There is just no rhyme or reason for doing half the things you do! It's infuriating. It's a lovely looking game, it's just too much of a faff and involves using the hint button waaaaay too much (i.e almost constantly)

review:
アイテム探し、ポイント＆クリックのゲームが好きですが 
この作品はあまりお勧めできないかな・・・

ヒントを使用しないと次に何をしていいのか分からなくなるし、
途中で入るムービーが多いのも気になりました。
3Ｄになっている部分がありマウスをドラッグすると
視点を変えることが出来るのですが これがまた分かりづらい。
ヒント使ってスキップしてたら いつの間にか終わっちゃった・・・
って感じでした。

author: {'steamid': '76561198164016063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 333, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1482944995}
review:
pros

- there is 3 difficulty options
- 3D puzzle designs
- good looking and colorful graphics
- puzzles are mostly enjoyable. they are not so easy or difficult
- story is intriguing 
- hidden object elements are fun.
- hint system very helpful
- game is long
- there is auto save

cons

- main and side characters are forgettable
- voice acting not good
- cut scene animations pretty stiff and not well made

author: {'steamid': '76561198090971773', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1461708298}
review:
คือ..จะว่าไงดี ก็ได้มาฟรีละนะ
แล้วก็มีไม่กี่เกมหรอกที่จะเป็น...ภาษาไทย!!
ใช่แล้ว ภาษาไทย ไม่ใช่แค่ภาษาไทยด้วย
เรื่องราวเกิดขึ้นในไทย ความเป็นไทยเข้ามาสุดๆ
กราฟฟิกง่ายๆเลยเป็นภาพ
เกมเพลย์นั่งดูนั่งคลิกไปเท่านั้นเอง
เนื้อเรื่องนี่สิ ที่คุณควรจะต้องสัมผัสกับเกมจำพวกนี้
ก็เราเป็นคนไทยนี่เนอะ เรื่องราวก็เลยจะยิ่งเข้าใจมากขึ้น

สรุปแล้ว
ได้มาฟรีก็คุ้มฆ่าเวลาไปได้หนึ่งคืนเต็มๆเลย กะลองเปิดเข้าไปดูเล่นๆนอนเช้าซะงั้น
แต่ถ้าจะเสียราคาเต็มก็ชะงักๆนิดนึงก็ดีนะ แต่ถ้าไม่ซี เหลือๆก็กดๆไปแหละ
เกมเด่นที่เนื้อเรื่อง แต่ก็นะบางทีก็จับแพะชนแกะซะเหลือเกิน 
จับความไทยมาใส่แทบทุกอณู แล้วคุณจะช็อคกับเนื้อเรื่องช่วงหลังฝุดๆเบยย

-5.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198025266541', 'num_games_owned': 3504, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 1048, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 806, 'last_played': 1482081266}
review:
Zaskakująco udany HOG (hidden object game). Spodziewałem się kolejnej leniwej i mało ambitnej kalki żerującej na popularności gatunku, tymczasem otrzymałem całkiem ładną i widowiskową przygodę pełną pomysłowych zagadek i nieźle pomyślanych sekwencji z ukrytymi obiektami. 

Wcielamy się w postać pani doktor archeologii Melissy K. Historia rozpoczyna się po odebraniu przez naszą bohaterkę listu z prośbą o zajęcie się edukacją młodego mnicha gdzieś w Bangkoku. Na miejscu okazuje się, że młody zniknął, a dzielna Melissa wyrusza na poszukiwania, po drodze napotykając na liczne niebezpieczeństwa i proste (choć bardzo satysfakcjonujące) łamigłówki. Spotykamy również kilkoro ciekawych postaci drugoplanowych, jak np. zwariowany stary mnich czy zakochany w Melissie Dr Julian. Obydwoje, wraz z bohaterką, też nie wyglądają na najmłodszych, jednak wciąż bawią się w dziecinne podchody miłosne. Trochę szkoda chłopa, ale nie będę siał spoilerów. W edycji kolekcjonerskiej (czyli tej, którą kupicie przez Steam, można się w niego wcielić w dodatkowej kampanii). 

Fabuła jest raczej głupia, ale całkiem sympatyczna i jak na HOG-a, bardzo rozbudowana. Doceniam to, że twórcy zdecydowali się urozmaicić rozgrywkę licznymi wstawkami animowanymi, dzięki czemu ciągle czułem zaciekawienie. Zagadki i sekwencje poszukiwania ukrytych na widoku obiektów, czyli rzecz najważniejsza w tego typu grze są dość proste, tylko czasem miałem moment typu "co ja mam tu zrobić?", ale wynikały one raczej ze zmęczenia (lubię grać po nocach) niż ich złożoności czy nietypowości. Muszę przyznać, że "sceny" hidden objects są poustawiane bardzo logicznie i nie miałem tu typowego dla gier tego typu poczucia chaosu i sztucznego zapełniania sceny jak najbardziej niedorzecznymi śmieciami. Wszystkie pozostałe zagadki, przy swojej prostocie, potrafią dać poczucie satysfakcji, a są to typowe mini gierki logiczne. Każdą można powtórzyć w odpowiednim menu gry. 

W Melissa K. and the Heart of Gold najbardziej urzekła mnie grafika. Umiejętnie łączy typową dla HOG-ów kreskę z trójwymiarowymi lokacjami i postaciami. Te ostatnie mogłyby być lepiej zrealizowane (szczególnie Melissa, spodziewałem się ślicznotki z okładki, a dostałem... ermm), ale i tak wygląda to całkiem ładnie i choć poruszają się dość niezgrabnie (motion capture musiała robić jedna osoba), na pewno wygląda to naturalniej niż kilka klatek na krzyż (tak, Artifex Mundi, do Was mówię). Zdarzają się czasem błędy graficzne, jak np. źle dobrane tekstury, ale ja naliczyłem 2 takie przypadki. Ogólnie, jest bardzo ładnie. Gwoli wyjaśnienia, trójwymiarowość lokacji jest ograniczona. Możemy się po nich rozglądać, ale nie poruszać - tutaj, klasycznie dla gier tego typu, jedynie przeskakujemy między lokacjami.

Muzyka i dźwięki w grze również stoją na wysokim poziomie, mimo że soundtrack to ledwie kilka utworów, które w żadnym razie nie zapadają w pamięci, ale również nie przeszkadzają, acz ładnie budują klimat.

Podsumowując, wbrew pozorom, Melissa K. może okazać się bardzo fajną zabawą zarówno dla fanów klasycznych przygodówek (jak ja), jak i miłośników szukania poukrywanych przedmiotów. I owszem, 9€ to trochę dużo, ale warto brać na wyprzedaży. Polecam.

UWAGA DLA POSZUKIWACZY OSIĄGNIĘĆ: Nie zawsze działa aż 5 z nich. Jeśli uczciwie zbierasz achievementy na Steamie, raczej omiń tę grę.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043803212', 'num_games_owned': 1891, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 851, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 851, 'last_played': 1481543630}
review:
Good game.  Find hidden objects, solve puzzles.  
I like that if you do get stuck and are unsure where to search next, you can use the hint button to get you going again. Theres nothing worse than wanting to continue playing a game, but quitting because you dont know what to do next.
Worth playing. Buy it, on sales its super cheap, and sometimes you are lucky enough to get it free in a giveaway.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997740965', 'num_games_owned': 8003, 'num_reviews': 2015, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1481367914}
review:
Я с большим интересом покупал эту игру, предвкушая найти в ней хорошую историю. На деле же мы получаем уникальную механику уровней, необычные задания, но сама история подвела до ужаса. Такое ощущение, что понять происходящее сможет только учитель философии из Таиланда, господа, вся сюжетная линия стоит на мифологии этой страны, но обычному человеку сложно все это понять. Я сам прилетел из Таиланда пару месяцев назад, но происходящее в игре мне понять не удалось. А к мифологии еще привязали третий рейх, инопланетян, призраков, демонов, клонов...ШО?! 
 Если бы в игру добавили доступный и интересный сюжет, то я бы поставил восхитительную оценку, а на деле и посоветовать не могу ее. 
 Отдельно возненавидел я финал этой игры. Он просто слит в молоко, а к самой игре добавляют некое дополнение, которое показывает часть этого же сюжета, но с точки зрения второго героя...только вот финалы разные. Кстати, оба финала взрывают мозг своим тупизмом. 

[spoiler] Главный герой летит по дороге на тук-туке (такси местное), а на заднем сиденье у него главный злодей. Дорогу перегородил маленький крокодил, который заставляет главного героя попасть в аварию. Из-за аварии злоде вылетает из машинки и попадает полностью маленькому крокодилу в рот. ШО БЛЯТЬ?! И все такие радостные уходят с маленьким Буддой в ковбойской шляпе.  [/spoiler] 
 Можно пройти под алкоголем.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014277307', 'num_games_owned': 2599, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1513906526}
review:
I picked up the game because I thought the name was funny (reminded me of a real life Melissa K)

I was expecting a hidden object game, but what I got was a fairly competent point and click adventure game that happened to have a few hidden object puzzles.

The game started off strong, but got muddled towards the end. Most of the time I was stuck because I hadn't returned to the correct old location to find new items. The robust hint system helped me skip past all the potentially frustrating clues.

author: {'steamid': '76561198175548145', 'num_games_owned': 925, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1639920963}
{'steamid': '76561198271554523', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1479679437}
review:
Partiamo dal presuposto che è un gioco punto e clicca di avventura, e non un gioco di azione. La mia opinione è questa:

- La grafica all'inizio può storccere il naso ma con il passare del tempo, può diventare piacevole "VOTO 8,5/10"

- La giocabilità (essendo un gioco punto e clicca) è molto fluido e da al giocatore quella sensazione di tranquillità, ma nello stesso tempo anche quella sensazione di vestire i panni della protagonista "VOTO 8/10"

- I sonori non possono essere un granchè per certe persone, ma posso dire con precisione che è davvero una galamita, per certe determinate persone che amano questo genere di gioco "VOTO 8,5/10"

- La trama è una cosa di colosale, quasi come se osservi un film al cinema. Scritta davvero bene e curata con massima precisione "VOTO 9/10"

VOTO 8,5/10

Il gioco è stato davvero impressionante con molti colpi di scena e con grande senso del pensiero, perchè dopo tutto è questo che serve in questi giochi il pensiero!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198087256125', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 563, 'last_played': 1479455755}
review:
PROs :
+ Challenging puzzles, also a lot of varieties
+ The hidden objects games is also quite difficult, there's some objects that require you to do something first in order to be able to found it
+ Unlimited hints, in case you like puzzle games but sucked hard at one like me
+ Decent graphic, for a small sized game

CONs :
- Unappealing characters, the design and animation is just awful and what makes it worse...
- Absolutely cringy voice acting, seriously the reason you still wanted to watch the cutscenes is because you will get an achievement for doing so later and I think the developer are completely aware of it
- Achievement bugs, there's 5 broken achievements on Steam (you still able to unlock it in-game though) 

In conclusion, I still recommend it because the main aspect of this game is the puzzles and that is probably the only good thing in this game
7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198237990262', 'num_games_owned': 1113, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1481714440}
review:
这个游戏是在 论坛上面本着囍+1的心态抽到的，当时也没想着去玩，但是之后入了D社的大包后，玩了一会the night of rabbit后[spoiler] （卡在教学关卡这种事情我会说出来？）	[/spoiler]才想起游戏库里还有这个同类型的解迷游戏，通关之后感觉游戏本体还不错，画面介于2D和3D之间，其实说实话人物建模有点丑，过场动画做成那个样子还不如不要好一点。。还有一点就是里面所设置的小游戏都挺有意思的，但是感觉小游戏重复率有点高了吧。。。然后推荐这游戏的主要原因是难度设置太感人了~\(≧▽≦)/~，我等脑残党完全就是靠提示一路点过去的23333


  然而我还是花了5个小时才通关。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198005145171', 'num_games_owned': 1618, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 438, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 438, 'last_played': 1479294981}
review:
일단 무료라는 기준으로 재미있게 플레이했으나 단점이 더 많이 부각되어 추천은 할 수 없을것 같습니다.

장점을 나열하자면

첫째. 퍼즐이 상당히 재미있습니다.
대게 규칙을  알려주지 않는 경우가 많아 스스로 유추해야 하는데
그 과정도 재미있었고 쉽진 않았지만 그렇다고 너무 어렵지도 않은 적정한 난이도였습니다.

둘째. 확장판의 결말 전개과정이 너무 유쾌합니다.
스포가 될 수 있으니 더 언급하진 않겠습니다만, 황당해서 실소가 나오면서도 정말 유쾌했습니다.

이제 단점을 나열하자면

첫째. 한글화 수준이  떨어집니다.
분명 한국어인데, 뭔 얘기를 하고있는건가 싶을정입니다.
스토리도 썩 좋지는 않지만 일단 1회차때는 한글화가 엉성해서 이해가 잘 안됩니다.
몇몇 규칙을 설명 해 주는 퍼즐도 있는데 한글화가 이상해서 규칙을 이해할  수 없는 경우도 있었습니다.

둘째. 인터페이스의 불편함입니다.
화면상에서 상호작용 가능한 위치, 물건들에 전혀 표시가 없습니다.
표시가 없어도 눈에 띄는 것들은 문제가 안됩니다만, 그렇지 않은 것들이 많다는게 문제입니다.

퍼즐로 숨은그림찾기 하는것도 눈 아픈데, 게임내내 숨은그림찾기 하듯 눈을 부릅뜨고 지켜보며 오브젝트 하나하나 클릭질을 해서 상호작용이 있는지 확인하는 과정이 너무 피곤합니다.

아티펙스사의 게임처럼 최소한 상호작용 가능한 오브젝트 위에 커서를 올리면 커서의 모양이 바뀌는 정도라도 해 줬어야 하는게 하닌가 싶습니다.
 

셋째. 목표와 행동의 개연성이 동떨어져 있습니다.

여자 유령이 배고프다며 먹을걸 구해오라는 목표가 있는데, 해야 할 행동은
요리나 사냥, 채집등을 하는게 아니고 베틀에서 헝겁을 만드는겁니다.
그 헝겁으로 장식장을 닦고 퍼즐을 풀면, 먹을걸 하나 주는데 유령이 먹길 거부하며 다른 음식을 요구합니다.

그 다음 할 행동은 한참전에 찾았지만 이상한 불길때문에 집을 수 없었던 확대기를 집어와 누에고치 통을 관찰하는 겁니다.  누에고치를 관찰해 퍼즐을 풀고나면 번데기나 나방류 음식이 아니라 오리알이 나옵니다.

그 불길이 뭐였는지, 왜 이제와 사라진건지 알 수 도 없을뿐더러 그게 확대기라는 것조차 알 수 없던 상황에서 "이제 확대기를 집을 수 있으니 그걸 집어와서 누에고치를 관찰 해 오리알을 얻어야지" 라고 유추할 수 있는 사람이 몇이나 될까요?

대게 이런식의 진행이 많아서 직관으로 게임을 추리하며 진행하기엔 무리가 있습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064562509', 'num_games_owned': 464, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 652, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 606, 'last_played': 1478623844}
review:
Also ich mag ja Wimmelbild und eine Story kann auch mal dabei sein.

Aber hier sind Logiken wie ich zu den  Zielen komme nicht gegeben.

Ich kann nicht ansatzweise raten wo ich als nächstes hin muss, ich brauch die Hilfe oder ich klicke mich tot.

Sei es weil ein paar Teile plötzlich an einem unlogischem Ort spawnen, sei es weil ein kleines Rätsel durch einen neuen Gegenstand in der Werkzeugleiste ermöglicht wird.
Ja, man bekommt nicht gesagt wo. Auch kein Hinweis.

Also klickt man zwischen den Rätsel immer auf die Hilfe bis sie einem sagt "Da musst du hin".

Sinnlosklicken mal anders.

Da man die Teile häufig auch direkt vor dem Rätsel schon erkennt, also es schlecht eingefügt ist, bekommt es bei mir eine Negativbewertung.

Alles in allem ein nicht passendes Spiel mit unglaublich unlogischer Story und Rätselfolge.

Die Rätsel an sich tendieren auf einem mittlerem Maß bis Grundschule.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030756861', 'num_games_owned': 948, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 4534, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4082, 'last_played': 1568683339}
review:
Melissa K is a HOG wth puzzles, with a good story and graphics, as well. I highly enjoyed it and the game does have some replayabilty bonus as well. I found the HOG parts of the game fun and challenging, the puzzle parts were also challenging, a few of the puzzles are even more diffcult than challenging. There is some extras to play as well, as you can attempt to get better scores on all three levels of puzzles outside of the story of the game. This can add hours of playtime for the game and it's pretty fun as well.

The game possibly can be a little buggy, there is help in the forums for those that find they have a problem. Also, a few of the achievements are broke on steam. As far as getting all the achievements there are a couple that would be pretty difficult  to get, I finally gave up trying to get the last two myself after quite a few times of trying. 

If you like  more challenging HOG/puzzle game, I recommend getting this. It is very fun and gives you more hours of playtime than the normal HOG game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017967750', 'num_games_owned': 1537, 'num_reviews': 1327, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1477988061}
review:
[h1]Stylished as 3D environment Hidden Object game and executed good enough.[/h1]
Well, it's the game obtained from IndieGala massive giveaway.
I had some fun with it, but it's not the best HOG kind of game:
a) some misspellings like "gui" (guy)
b) the monk we meet looks like he's high (my friend's comment and I partially agree)
c) can't really get into game early, intro's not good enough

Well, it was free game for me and it wasn't really that bad and nothing game breaking happened so far.

author: {'steamid': '76561198183888075', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1479219492}
review:
Oyunda bir arkeoloji profesörüyüz ve londrada yaşıyoruz, gelen bir havadis üzerine eski bir yapıya gidiyoruz ve oyunumuz burada başlıyor.

Etraftaki objelerden ipuçları elde ederek ilerliyoruz ve büyük hazineye ulaşmaya çalışıyoruz.

Oynanışı gayet basit ve güzel :)
Bu tür araştırma oyunlarını sevenlerin hoşuna gidicek türden bir oyun.

Oyuna para vermeye değermi dersen, hayır bu fiyata daha kaliteli oyunlar var.
Oyun şuan ücretsiz olarak dağıtılıyor internete araştırıp steam key bularak edinebilirsiniz.

Oyun çıkış tarihi ve türünü göz önünde bulundurursak 7/10 puan veriyorum.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991907822', 'num_games_owned': 1785, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1477816831}
review:
The game, as is, isn't all too bad. The only thing bothering me is that, at some point or another, it wasn't clear to me what to do/where to go next. Either I'm really out of touch, or it's completely random as to where you get the next step to proceed (a certain monk comes to mind).
Had those moments not been random, this would've been a decent mixup of a game. 
At the start I felt kind of tossed in. Maybe there was some intro I skipped. Possibly. Probably.
That being said, the puzzles were decent enough (and the variety was really good). The story weaving it all together was well enough to keep me going. But the game as a whole just had this arbitrary feel to it when it came to progression and length. At some point it felt like guessing what to do next was the only option (either that, or use the hint button). Sometimes there just wasn't any build-up to what came next. Talking to the aforementioned monk felt quite random at times, but was the only step left to progress.

All in all, the game is enjoyable enough to warrant a buy. Even at full price it gives me more than the usual four hours of entertainment. That being said, this is one of the few games in its genre where I actually needed a hint or two as to where to go next. 
And that last part is what makes me *not* recommend it. I feel like I shouldn't be needing the help of the hint button. The random progression factor killed the flow of the game enough for it to not be worth it full price. On sale, though, it will give you more worth for your money than most games in the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167574853', 'num_games_owned': 38, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1475321419}

author: {'steamid': '76561198001791772', 'num_games_owned': 923, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 496, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 496, 'last_played': 1477569913}
review:
Historia opowiada losy Melissy K., pani naukowiec, która zostaje zmuszona do odnalezienia zaginionego młodego adepta buddyzmu. Fabułę jest całkiem przyjemna, aczkolwiek nie jest to coś, co nas wciągnie i wypluje po 36 godzinach gry. Plusem jest możliwość odegrania innej części fabuły, tym razem jako pan naukowiec, który jest - powiedzmy - kolegą Melissy. Ta część toczy się równolegle do historii Melissy i przeplata się z nią.

Najbardziej spodobał mi się gameplay - gra jest pełna różnych puzzli, szukania na ekranie przedmiotów z listy (taka mini-gra) itp. Są dość zróżnicowane, czasem trudne, czasem łatwe. Jednak poziomem trudności nie należy się przejmować, ponieważ gra ma dobry system podpowiedzi, dzięki czemu bez problemów można popchać fabułę do przodu.
Co prawda sam fakt istnienia podpowiedzi może się nie spodobać "hardcore'owym" fanom przygodówek, ale nie muszą z nich przecież korzystać, a mnie - jako niedzielnemu graczowi - bardzo pomogło. Zwłaszcza, że nie zawsze wszystko jest logiczne i jasne.

Grafika jest w porządku. Dźwięk również.

Ogólnie grę oceniłbym na 6, może 7-, na 10 możliwych punktów. Gra się przyjemnie, jej przejście zajęło mi 8 godzin przy średniej częstotliwości używania podpowiedzi. Jednakże myślę, że nie jest to gra, która zostanie w Waszej pamięcie na dłużej.

author: {'steamid': '76561198241220092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 804, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 804, 'last_played': 1463597951}
review:
Melissa K. & The Heart of Gold ist ein wunderschönes Point&Click-Abenteuer mit einer einzigartigen, interaktiven 3D-Welt und mysteriösen Puzzles.
 
Freue Dich auf ein Spielerlebnis, das Dich nicht so schnell loslassen wird.

Die Geschichte spielt in Thailand im Jahr 1947 und enthält Charaktere, Mythen und Legenden 
aus dortigen volkstümlichen und buddhistischen Geschichten. Du musst auch Intrigen und Verschwörungen aufdecken, um alle Rätsel lösen zu können.

Als Melissa von der Königin von England eingeladen wird, hat sie keine Ahnung, 
dass sich dadurch ihr Leben dramatisch verändern wird. Eine am Anfang einfach klingende Mission führt dazu, dass ihre grundlegende Existenz in Frage gestellt wird. 

Du übernimmst die Rolle der Melissa, die versucht, das Rätsel um das Verschwinden des jungen Mönchs aufzudecken.

Viele Schauplätze im Spiel, durch die Du Dich navigieren musst, beinhalten Rätsel und komplette Minispiele, bei deren Lösung Punkte gesammelt werden können und Du dadurch auch im Spiel weiter kommst. 

Du kannst das Spiel in verschiedenen Schwierigkeitsstufen spielen, so das auch Deine kleine Schwester oder Dein kleiner Bruder miträtseln können.

Meine Tochter, 8 Jahre, war begeistert und hat nicht eher Ruhe gelassen, bis wir das Spiel geschafft hatten.

Die Grafik ist sehr schön und zusammen mit der Vertonung ein rundum gelungenes Spielepaket.
Alle Schauplätze und die Filmsequenzen sind detailliert, grafisch gut umgesetzt und versetzen Dich in eine mystische Stimmung.

Wieder ein Point&Click-Adventure, zu dem ich nur sagen kann, wenn es im Angebot ist, kaufen und Spaß haben. 
Ein Spiel für die ganze Familie, wobei Groß und Klein ihren Spaß haben werden.

Old Sniper 1963

author: {'steamid': '76561198283482125', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 515, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 515, 'last_played': 1476357406}
review:
Un Indiana Jones au féminin bien contruit.
Très sympa pour ce qui est de l'intrigue, des graphismes et des animations (pas trop fait attention à la musique).
La difficulté majeure sera de trouver les indices. En effet, contrairement à d'autres point'n click, il y a un seul et unique curseur, pas de loupe, ou d'engrenage.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009528477', 'num_games_owned': 1986, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1475247073}
review:
It's one of those hidden object games, which means I spent 10 minutes furiously clicking various parts of the screen whilst waiting for something to either happen or my mouse to break. It is beyond me how people can stand this sort of "gameplay", but I find it highly unenjoyable and absolutely dreadful.
You're  Melissa K, on a mission to do something...somewhere.. Suddenly a monk got lost and you have to look for him by doing the aforementioned furious clicking. The game offers a large variety of unfun things to do like 
- clicking items and being told that your character should probably try that later
- clicking items, opening up a new screen in which you can't do anything since you're apparently missing something
- opening up other screens in which you have to find a multitude of items in odd shapes, which are conveniently hidden amongst a bazillion other items and getting spooked by some sort of red ghostly entity when you misclick too many times, just to annoy the hell out of you some more
- sending a lizard into holes and other small orifices to receive an item which, I grant the game that, often makes sense to use in a certain place
- clicking through a screen you already gave the click over once, again, because stuff does appear or becomes clickable at some point without you really knowing why or how
and so on and so forth..

I do agree that my 10 minute gameplay is probably not meeting the standards of IGN quality reviewing, but you should already know if you like this kind of game or not. If you do, then there's a high chance you'll enjoy this game as well, since the production values seem alright and there's a lot of puzzling and clicking to be done.
But if you, like me, are not a fan of this genre, then there's nothing here for you. Stick to something like the LucasArts adventures or The Book of Unwritten Tales or similar blends of "proper" adventure games for a more fulfilling experience.
This was my biased review, thanks for letting me enlighten you :p

author: {'steamid': '76561198118975679', 'num_games_owned': 181, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1457207905}
review:
http://justa13littlegirl.blogspot.it/2016/03/melissa-k-and-heart-of-gold.html

 Spulciando la mia lista giochi di steam ho trovato questo gioco e non avevo idea di che fosse, così l'ho installato. Si è rivelato essere un punta e clicca davvero interessante.

Melissa, la protagonista viene mandata in Tailandia dalla regina d'Inghilterra per diventare l'insegnante di un giovane monaco buddista, ma quando arriva il ragazzo sparisce e la nostra avventura per ritrovarlo inizia passando attraverso miti e leggende orientali. Storia intrigante e buoni enigmi che passano dal "cerca l'oggetto" a veri e propri quesiti dove bisogna riflettere un bel po'. Il tutto è illustrato magnificamente, con una grafica tendente al reale che nasconde mille segreti. I luoghi da visitare non saranno moltissimi, ma ricchi di particolari e alcuni di essi spunteranno solo dopo aver completato certe missioni. Anche la colonna sonora è piacevole, e a tratti rilassante.


Sarà che io sono di parte, ma questo gioco mi è davvero piaciuto! Dico di essere di parte perché il genere mi appassiona sempre, anche se ci sono difetti, e anche questo ne ha e particolarmente fastidio mi ha dato i filmati mentre i vari personaggi parlavano che accompagnati ad un doppiaggio davvero osceno sono stati un pugno in un occhio. E se il resto non fosse stato così attraente non credo che nemmeno lo avrei finito. Invece in questo caso e come con sempre meno giochi accade, mi ha ipnotizzato, e con l'idea di perderci un'ora massimo finivo per giocarci anche tre ore di fila dimenticando tutto quello che mi circondava. E' una sensazione bella, ma anche pericolosa, perché perdere la nozione del tempo può portare a ritardare tante altre cose.

Non ho molto altro da aggiungere su questo titolo, se non che oltre alla storia principale ci viene offerta anche una secondaria, nel quale impersoneremo non più Melissa, ma il suo amico/rivale/amore di cui ora mi sfugge il nome, e ripercorremmo la storia dal suo punto di vista con qualche modifica. Questo extra è decisamente più corto, ma contiene enigmi riguardanti lo zodiaco molto interessanti. Nel menù principale troviamo infine una una voce con la raccolta di tutti gli enigmi da poter rifare quante volte vorremo, tutti i filmati e artwork. Dimenticavo! Durante le due avventure avremo a disposizione un diario dove verranno annotati tutti gli indizi e le informazioni importanti con disegni, foto e scritte. E' davvero utile ed è fatto meravigliosamente, mi ha fatto venir voglia di averne una copia cartacea da sfogliare cento volte.

Consiglio questo gioco a tutti, anche a chi non è portato per gli enigmi, anche perché esiste il tasto "aiuto" da utilizzare senza sosta, perché è una gioia per gli occhi e la trama molto interessante.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984373540', 'num_games_owned': 265, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1474580137}
review:
I have mixed emotions after playing Melissa K. and the Heart of Gold.  I really enjoy adventure and puzzle games and games with a good story line. This game has it all. However, there are a few things that I got annoyed with:

The cons:
- The ghost voices were annoying,  The voices sounded like they were drunk on nyquil when speaking.
- The "guide" talked too slow too like he was on drugs.
- The elder monk was too weird (but all in all likeable)
- I found myself using hints way too much because the "clues" were in areas that you would never think to look or have a reason to.  Nothing gave you a hint as to where items might be unless you actually used the hint button. 
- Some of the puzzles were too hard to the point where I had to "skip" a lot of them. 
---->SPOILER ALERT!! [spoiler] The elder monk sacrifices himself in the fire, you sick bastards. *cries for days*[/spoiler]

The pros:
-Amazing graphics, beautiful scenery
- Really good story line with some plot twists to keep you interested
- Great voice acting except for those damn ghosts
- You get a lizard for a pet, how cool is that?
- You can move forward without having to do a lot of hidden puzzles.

All in all I would say try this out for yourself and see how you like it. I paid .49 cents for it and I would say I got my money's worth.  Just wish a few things were a little different that's all :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198072381855', 'num_games_owned': 395, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 2275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1768, 'last_played': 1491064072}
review:
Я вообще не любитель всей это казуальщины и последней такой игрой в которую я играл, была Алеша Попович, в далеком прошлом. Я больше люблю убивать….много убивать. 

Получив Мелиссу бесплатно (ибо часто раздают), я думал что она легко зайдет, но черт как же я ошибался. Поначалу вроде все просто, но после, я как то вообще потерял логику вещей. Различные вещи разбрасывались сново по локациям, которые мы пробежали. Не всегда понятно что от тебя хотят, и приходится опять и опять юзать подсказки. Но что самое терпеть не могу, это прожигать глазами экран с целью, найти какую-нибудь, мелкую фигню. А финальная “головоломка” разбудила во мне Килиманджаро, вся ее суть в быстроте нажатия мной кнопки мыши.

Разработчики видно решили затащить игроков еще глубже в мир Мелиссы, поэтому все загадки, что вы прошли, придется пройти еще пару раз на разных сложностях, и на каждой из них поставить свой рекорд по времени. Ненавижу игры на время.

[h1]Что имеем?[/h1]
[b]- [/b]Затянутость. (ну серьезно, это не та игра, на которую хочется убить много времени.)
[b]- [/b]Имеются нелогичные вещи.
[b]- [/b]Запутанность. (В плане того, что не всегда понятно что делать.)

[b]+ [/b]Локации. (Они являются воссозданием реально существующих мест.)
[b]+ [/b]Саундтрек.
[b]+ [/b]Кат-сцены. (Посмотрев ролик, как их делали, я просто не могу не плюсануть, за старание.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198028570547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2563, 'playtime_forever': 624, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 624, 'last_played': 1460491617}
review:
"Melissa K. and the Heart of Gold Collector's Edition" ist ein Wimmelbildspiel mit relativ vielen Adventure und Puzzle-Einlagen. Und das Game ist offenbar primär für Tablets konzipiert. Allerdings: die Portierung ist recht gut, die Bedienbarkeit für einen solchen Titel recht unproblematisch.

Kurz nach dem Zweiten Weltkrieg: ein thailändischer Junge, ein junger Mönch wird vermißt. Wir, Melissa K., Professorin für Archäologie und ein weiblicher Indiana Jones-Verschnitt, stürzen uns gleich ins Abenteuer voll Mythen und Mysterien. Praktisch dabei: auf Logik brauchen wir nicht achten. Das ganze Game ist ein wildes Sammelsurium aus mythologischen Anspielungen, wilden Klischees und weichgespülten Plattheiten, die willkürlich um die eigentlich relevanten Puzzles und Wimmelbildspiele gebaut wurden.

Aber dennoch: die Rätsel sind fast durchweg gut und durchaus abwechslungsreich, die Mechaniken funktionieren, manches ist sogar richtig liebevoll gestaltet und sogar die Spielzeit kann sich mit etwa 5-7 Stunden für das Genre durchaus sehen lassen. Hin und wieder taucht gar charmante Ironie auf. 

Grafisch kann der Titel vor allem  druchaus überzeugen auch wenn vor allem Animationen sehr staksig und unbeholfen wirken. Auch die Sounds und Vertonungen sind nicht herausragend, aber professionell gemacht.

[h1]Wertung:[/h1]
7/10 Atmosphäre
5/10 Story
7/10 Grafik
7/10 Sound
7/10 Spielmechanik
6/10 Balancing
7/10 Spielspass

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Qualitativ gute Wimmelbild Tablet-Portierung.

[b][h1]7/10 Gesamtwertung

review:
Хороший point & click квест/поиск предметов. Много интересных фишек, приятная графика. Куча головоломок, среди них встречаются и довольно сложные. Из минусов - немного муторный сюжет, порой в применении придметов нет никакой логики - порой использовал подсказки просто во избежание траты времени.

А еще здесь очень крутая доп кампания, она на мой взгляд интереснее основной!;) фишка с суперзрением понравилась  и головоломки в ней заставляют пораскинуть мозгами

review: It's a nice enough Hidden Object Game, with other types of puzzles mixed in.  Only issue is that about 5 of the achievements are broken in steam.  The game will still recognize that you got them in its "achievements" tab, and I think you can still get the one for getting all achievements, but it's still a shame that the devs never bothered to fix it.  If you like HOGs, pick this up during a sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074744887', 'num_games_owned': 1511, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 587, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 587, 'last_played': 1471546416}
review:
Ez tipikusan az az eset, amikor nem elegendő az igen/nem az ajánláshoz, mert 3/5 vagy 5/10-es értékelést adnék, mert igen vegyesek az érzéseim a végigjátszás után is.
Az nem kérdés, hogy a manapság elterjedt adventure-puzzle-hiddenobject kategóriába tartozik, egy viszonylag szokásos történettel, amely ezúttal pár évvel a II. világháború után játszódik.
Legfőbb erénye, hogy próbál egy-két új ötletet becsempészni, vagy a sokszor látottakat feldobni valamivel. Ezek egyike, hogy pl. a helyszínek nem egyképernyősek, ugyanakkor a "kamerakezelés" viszont kényelmetlen.
A ténykedésünk, a logika helyett, gyakran a vak próbálgatáson múlik (ha az ember nem akarja folyamatosan a segítséget kérő gombot nyomkodni) és sokszor van szívatás érzése az embernek (bár ez tekinthető nehezítésnek, és van aki azt szereti).
És a legrosszabbak a béna szereplők és átvezető párbeszédek, ehhez a kategóriához képest is.
Ami miatt az igen felé billen a mérleg nyelve, hogy szezonális leértékeléseknél egy euró alatt be lehet szerezni (vagy különböző bundle lehetőségekkel) és aki a nehézségeken túl tudja tenni magát, így mindenképp megéri.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088036974', 'num_games_owned': 887, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 281, 'last_played': 1469152268}
review:
真单击游戏
气氛渲染好评 
大部分谜题有趣好评
画风精致好评
电影过场中评（3D效果廉价）
有些谜题没有什么逻辑中评
剧情扯淡中评（你真的会在意剧情？）
总结：其实没什么好说的这类游戏玩起来都差不多而且打折下来才3软，消遣消遣时间还是不错的

通关之后解锁教授故事线，也是对前面剧情的弥补

author: {'steamid': '76561198087829022', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1468010814}
review:
A história não é ruim
mas as mecanicas são péssimas...

Os quebra cabeças são otimos mas eles não funcionam bem nem todos é claro, a ideia geral do jogo é promissora mas a execução do mesmo é decepcionante...

Backgrounds: Nos somos cientes que em toda area de um jogo assim nos temos que procurar coisas, mas aqui como o "3D" você simplesmente não tem nenhuma indicação qua ali do lado é um caminho ou que você tem que aarstar a tela para cima, ou sabe lá para aonde.

Os minigames 3d: Como assim algo que deveria girar facil e fluido, só não faz isso, como você completa um jogo em 3D quando as funções que deveriam funcionar nele, não acontece?

Uma pena que a mecanica desse jogo seja tão pobre, ahistória não é mal, mas não é também uma obra prima, e alem disso eu percebo que o jogo te prende, você não pode achar um item antes que te falem para fazer isso, de jeito algum aqui...

Eu daria de 10 uns 3,5, se ainda quiser tentar esse jogo pegue em um promoção, mas eu realmente daria uma analise neutra a ele. Ainda bem que eu ganhei, eu iria compra-lo, estou feliz por não ter feito isso.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131012824', 'num_games_owned': 272, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 412, 'last_played': 1467303561}
review:
Из кучи отрицательных отзывов...Я, пожалуй, оставлю положительный:
[list]
[*]Игра затянула, прошёл за один день
[*]B конце уже было скучно, но это покрывалось разнобразием локаций
[*]Историю в игре я не понял и проходя её, ближе к концу, соовсем запутался
[*]Даже если вы прошли игру, но вам хочется больше, то вам представляют дополнительные игры (которых я не играл и не проверял, по этому не скажу что там и как там) )
[/list]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Механика в игре[/b]
[list]
[*]Перевод на русский, с помощью [url=https://translate.google.ru]Translate Google[/url], в чём я уверен. Перевод дословный, Иногда героиня называла себя в мужском роде (По видимому наша героиня хикка :3 ).
[*]Особых багов я не видел, в чём обвиняют остальные игроки в отзывах.
[*]Понравилось проектирование игры в 3д (ну...частичном). Передвигай экран в игре, что бы видеть недостающие вещи или проходы на другую локацию. Данной фишки не хватает во многих "ПоискПредметов" играх. 
[*]Одним из плюсов является так же инвентаризация предметов - крути, нажимай, доставай, делай!
[*]Музыку я не помню, значит не сильно зацепила (Логика топ :] )
[/list]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ну и в итоге, потратить своё время, играя за этой игрушкой, можно, если делать попросту нечего)

[tr]
[th]-[/th]
[th]Оценка[/th]
[/tr]

[td]6[/td]

author: {'steamid': '76561198017977574', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 151, 'playtime_forever': 848, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 848, 'last_played': 1467107840}
review:
Se cercate un hidden object mediamente difficile questo è il gioco che fa per voi. Tra la modalità facile e la difficile non vi sono grandi differenze se non nella penalizzazione dei click e qualche altra piccolezza. Pur apprezzando tuttavia l'impegno nel realizzarlo, ho trovato il gameplay a tratti frustrante. Infatti in almeno 5 fasi mi sono bloccato perché si rimane senza idee su come procedere. Il diaro di gioco in alcune fasi spiega bene in altre presenta delle lacune di trama che avrebbero fatto bene al gameplay. A complicare le cose, vi è la mancanza di alcune aree sensibili con cui agire, indispensabili per procedere oltre, mentre in altre ancora, ho avuto la netta sensazione che aree con oggetti celati dal buio, nonostante le ripetute passate e ripassate con la torcia, si sbloccassero solo dopo la pressione del tasto help...davvero terribile.
Molte schermate hidden object hanno il vantaggio di essere "multilingua" poiché presentano sagome o parti di oggetto evitando la classica sfilza di nomi, tra cui ci scappa quello tradotto male.
Per concludere se vi piace questo genere di gioco, prendetelo in sconto e fateci una partita come ho fatto io, ma la voglia di rigiocarci non ce l'ho proprio.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064025377', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1466809975}
review:
This is clearly a phone game ported to steam. Game mechanics include dragging the screen around and when you click, a tapping finger appears. Even on expert mode, if you spend just a few seconds without clicking on something, the finger appears to guide your actions/hint you. Puzzles are largely touch-based - dragging flowers around without knocking any off, drag a rolling screen around until you find the button. 

The logic behind what to do next makes very little sense. If you click on something, text appears that it "looks interesting, but I'll check it out later." So, instead of discovering things as you find them, the game will guide you to go back and click on a spot on the ground outside when you are trying to find a way into the rooms inside (becuase something you needed was out there). 

At one point, you cannot pick up a map on a window until you find a curtain sash and tie the curtain back. :| 

There are far better point-and-click/hidden object adventure games out there. This one is just frustrating.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164151349', 'num_games_owned': 2681, 'num_reviews': 229, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1468429437}
review:
[h1]About the game[/h1]
You're Melissa, a professor of archaeology, who's gone to Thailand to teach a student - a young monk. At least, that's what I gathered from the fragmented and rather useless game intro. No reason is given for your being there, nor why you must "teach" that young monk or whatever. Once you arrive, the young monk apparently goes missing, and you must help find him. You then proceed to search the grounds of the house you are staying in for traces of the monk. That's it. 

[h1]Likes[/h1]
[olist]
    [*][u]Nice graphics[/u]
    [*][u]OK music[/u]
    [*][u]Voiced in some parts[/u]
[/olist]

[h1]Dislikes[/h1]
[olist]
    [*][u]Extremely poor plot setup:[/u]
[list]
    [*]Insufficient story background so the player has no incentive to find out more
    [*]No proper explanation for why you must do all this
    [*]Boring premise: [i]Monk disappears. So? Why should I care? Why the f*ck am I even in Thailand?![/i]
[/list]
    [*][u]Irritating & badly thought-through game mechanics:[/u]
[list]
    [*]Even on "normal" difficulty mode, if you leave the game running without doing anything, a hand will pop up and start pointing at what to do next
    [*]No direction arrows showing where you can navigate to; instead, you must click on stuff until you find an exit
    [*]When your character sees something noteworthy, instead of telling you direct (via text commentary), her observations go into her notebook, so you must check her notebook each and every time to see what she says about an item
    [*]Even on "easy" difficulty mode, active areas are never highlighted; instead, the game will tell you exactly what to do by pointing!
    [*]Some rooms don't fit on one screen, so you have to drag your screen sideways to see the entire thing, but there is no indication of whether you can drag the screen or not, so you'll just have to test it out on every screen
[/list]
    [*][u]No logic in the game's priorities:[/u]
[list]
    [*]When you enter/exit a room, the game attempts to make it seem like it's a 1st-person 3D game (it's [i]not[/i], in case you were wondering - it's just static screens), so the screen jerks and wobbles a bit, and the background zooms in, to give the impression that your character is "walking" towards the exit. [b][i]WHY??????? How on earth does doing this enhance the game in any way????? All it gave me was motion sickness, dumbtards!!!!!![/i][/b] Also, this made exiting any location take a million years.
    [*]We really don't need to see cutscenes every single time characters speak to each other ok? Especially when those cutscenes involve boring or non-important exchanges.
[/list]
    [*][u]Puzzles are inane or don't make sense, and there are no hidden object scenes:[/u]
[list]
    [*]E.g. Feed chocolate bar to lizard so you can grab him and use him later on to retrieve objects in unreachable places. [i]Since when did lizards eat chocolate?[/i]
    [*]E.g. Put found statue parts onto a statue. (No puzzle involved - just click anywhere on the statue to place them.)
    [*]E.g. Light a lantern with a match.
    [*]Almost an hour into the game, and I [i]still[/i] did not encounter any hidden object scenes. I guess the hidden object scenes became hidden objects themselves.
[/list]
[/olist]

[h1]Verdict[/h1]
Money was spent making this game, but in all the wrong areas. Showing animation of people talking, or attempting to make it look as if your character is walking towards an exit, and etc fancy schmancy stuff along this line, are NOT going to make people care more about playing. The horrible story setup, lack of drama, counter-intuitive game mechanics, and yawn-inducing puzzles make it extremely difficult for the player's interest to be sustained. 

Avoid, unless you are a person of great patience. Or unless you are really (and I mean [i]really[/i]) desperate to play something that has nice graphics and voice, but little else. Kids (maybe 4-8 years of age) might like this, because of the hand-holding and animation. But other than that, I can't think of anyone who would want to play this and not feel mentally insulted.


[table]
    [tr]
        [td][u]Disclaimer:[/u] Game played for free, thanks to my dear friend [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/unpageable]Unpageable[/url]. :)[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

author: {'steamid': '76561198076672141', 'num_games_owned': 1041, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1465388885}
review: Не советую ее брать. Так как я получила ее бесплатно, я, к счастью, ничего не потеряла (кроме времени, естественно) Но она не стоила даже этого. Перевод на русский просто отвратительный, приходилось ориентироваться на озвучку, язык сменить никак нельзя поэтому приходиться мучиться потому что в тексте почти ничего не понятно, с гораздо большим успехом я могла бы читать иероглифы. И если быть откровенной - оригинал тоже не блещет оригинальностью, и литературностью текста (только для растопки и годится). Игра голосовых актеров тоже не понравилась. Все как-то натянуто, неестественно. Остается только радовать, что скучнейшие загадки можно просто пропустить не тратя на это свое время.

author: {'steamid': '76561198262251865', 'num_games_owned': 462, 'num_reviews': 350, 'playtime_forever': 420, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 420, 'last_played': 1465361462}
review:
"Mellissa wouldn't want me to take this cigar until I replace it with something of equal value!"

*click around for 5-10 minutes, no luck, just try random items*

TURNS OUT I WAS LOOKING FOR A PIECE OF FRUIT.

Only bother with this game if you get it for free, and enjoy the genre. HoB are notoriously dense and poorly made, but there are far better for-pay ones than this out there.
